original_text: When Mordecai heard this message from Esther, 13 he sent this answer back to her: ‘Do not think that you will be safe because you live in the king's palace. You will not escape when they kill all the other Jews.

sentences.original_text: When Mordecai heard this message from Esther
sentences.korean_translation: 모르드개가 에스더에게서 이 소식을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: he sent this answer back to her:
'Do not think that you will be safe
because you live in the king's palace.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 왕의 궁에 살고 있기 때문이다.'

sentences.original_text: when they kill all the other Jews.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다른 모든 유대인들을 죽일 때.
